meanings.def: a social group in a traditional society consisting of people with the same language, culture, religion, etc., living in a particular area and often having one leader known as a chief
examples: They were a nomadic horse-riding tribe.
The dancers are all members of the Tembu tribe.
They recruited the toughest soldiers from the desert tribes.
We spoke to Umbara, the headman of the Ywin tribe.

meanings.def: a group or class of people, especially of one profession
examples: He had a sudden outburst against the whole tribe of actors.

meanings.def: a group of related animals or plants

examples: One or two of the grandchildren will be there, but not the whole tribe.
